Package neqsim.pvtsimulation.regression

Class PVTRegression

java.lang.Object
neqsim.pvtsimulation.regression.PVTRegression
public class PVTRegression extends Object
PVT Regression Framework for automatic EOS model tuning.

This class provides a comprehensive framework for tuning equation of state parameters to match experimental PVT data. It supports multi-objective regression fitting CCE, CVD, DLE, and separator test data simultaneously.

Example usage: 

 
 PVTRegression regression = new PVTRegression(fluid);
 regression.addCCEData(pressures, relativeVolumes, temperature);
 regression.addDLEData(pressures, Rs, Bo, oilDensity, temperature);
 regression.addRegressionParameter(RegressionParameter.BIP_METHANE_C7PLUS, 0.0, 0.10, 0.03);
 RegressionResult result = regression.runRegression();
 SystemInterface tunedFluid = result.getTunedFluid();
Version:
1.0
Author:
ESOL

  • Method Details

    • addCCEData

      public void addCCEData(double[] pressures, double[] relativeVolumes, double temperature)
      Add CCE (Constant Composition Expansion) experimental data.
      Parameters:
      pressures - pressure values in bar
      relativeVolumes - relative volume values (V/Vsat)
      temperature - experiment temperature in K

    • addCCEData

      public void addCCEData(double[] pressures, double[] relativeVolumes, double[] yFactors, double temperature)
      Add CCE data with Y-factor (for gas phase above saturation).
      Parameters:
      pressures - pressure values in bar
      relativeVolumes - relative volume values
      yFactors - Y-factor values (optional, use Double.NaN if not available)
      temperature - experiment temperature in K

    • addCVDData

      public void addCVDData(double[] pressures, double[] liquidDropout, double[] zFactors, double temperature)
      Add CVD (Constant Volume Depletion) experimental data.
      Parameters:
      pressures - pressure values in bar
      liquidDropout - liquid dropout values (volume %)
      zFactors - gas compressibility factors
      temperature - experiment temperature in K

    • addDLEData

      public void addDLEData(double[] pressures, double[] rs, double[] bo, double[] oilDensity, double temperature)
      Add DLE (Differential Liberation Expansion) experimental data.
      Parameters:
      pressures - pressure values in bar
      rs - solution gas-oil ratio (Sm³/Sm³)
      bo - oil formation volume factor (m³/Sm³)
      oilDensity - oil density (kg/m³)
      temperature - experiment temperature in K

    • addSeparatorData

      public void addSeparatorData(double gor, double bo, double apiGravity, double separatorPressure, double separatorTemperature, double reservoirTemperature)
      Add separator test experimental data.
      Parameters:
      gor - gas-oil ratio (Sm³/Sm³)
      bo - oil formation volume factor
      apiGravity - API gravity
      separatorPressure - separator pressure in bar
      separatorTemperature - separator temperature in K
      reservoirTemperature - reservoir temperature in K

    • addRegressionParameter

      public void addRegressionParameter(RegressionParameter parameter, double lowerBound, double upperBound, double initialGuess)
      Add a regression parameter with bounds.
      Parameters:
      parameter - the parameter type to regress
      lowerBound - lower bound for the parameter
      upperBound - upper bound for the parameter
      initialGuess - initial guess for the parameter
